Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory289.png'}
{2: 'Red Tide Projection', 3: '...'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'I was planning on complaining how hard it was to look for you that day. But, never mind.'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'How do you feel now?'}
{2: 'Red Tide Projection', 3: '...Cold...'}
{2: 'Red Tide Projection', 3: '...Come, keep me company... Shrek...'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'Is this what a biscuit covered in mud looks like, Bella girl?'}
{2: 'Red Tide Projection', 3: '...'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "...I've never missed bantering with you so much, Bella."}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "You're no longer... you."}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'Farewell, illusion created by the Red Tide.'}
{3: 'He waves his hand, then carefully puts the book that Bella gave him into the inner slot of his backpack and prepares to leave.'}
{2: 'Red Tide Projection', 3: '...Shrek... You will live.'}
{2: 'Red Tide Projection', 3: 'Let me explore... the unknown.'}
{2: 'Red Tide Projection', 3: 'Farewell.'}
{3: 'Trembling, he walks a few steps forward and reaches out a hand to touch the projection that reminds him of Bella.'}
{3: "Even though he is wearing a full set of protective gear, the infection quickly spreads from Shrek's fingertips toward the rest of his body."}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: '...Farewell, Bella.'}
{3: 'He absentmindedly withdraws his hand and takes a step back.'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: '...Farewell.'}
{3: 'Shrek silently repeats this word in his mind. He takes a few more wobbly steps back and gazes at the Red Tide projection from a distance.'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: '...Farewell. Farewell...'}
{3: 'He says it over and over again as if trying to convince himself. By nightfall, the Red Tide projection has retreated underground with the Red Tide itself.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory286.png'}
{3: 'Gazing at the empty street, Shrek reaches out a hand toward the receding Red Tide. Eventually, his hand drops down.'}
{3: 'He staggers a few steps forward then turns around and sees the words that Bella painted on the wall.'}
{3: '"Earth has been stricken with innumerable disasters, and time has washed every one of them away. Live for tomorrow, because all will pass."'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: '...Yeah... Disasters will pass, no matter what they are.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a self-mocking smile he writes another line under the quote.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: '—"Of course. But where do I find you then?"'}
{3: "There has never been an endless winter on this planet, but when spring comes and the ice melts away, you won't be there to see it with me."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory286.png'}
{3: 'After he writes that line, he stands still in front of it for a long time, but eventually takes out the dagger and scratches off everything after "Of course."'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shrek', 3: "I should keep the quote the way it is. Even if it's a placebo, it'll encourage someone at some point.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Shrek gives himself a shot of serum then picks up his heavy backpack and continues the journey... alone.'}
